name: UITableViewDropProposal.Intent
desc: Constants indicating how you intend to handle a drop.

items.name: case insertAtDestinationIndexPath
items.desc: Insert the dropped content at the specified index path.

items.name: case insertIntoDestinationIndexPath
items.desc: Incorporate the dropped content into the row at the specified index path.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: Incorporate the content in an appropriate way based on the drop location.
